Package metaface.server

Interface Summary
HTTPServerListener Used by the server to listen for messages from the HTTPClient Copyright (c) 1996,1997,1998 Sun Microsystems, Inc.
Worker An interface for worker threads to adhere to Copyright (c) 1996,1997,1998 Sun Microsystems, Inc.
 

Class Summary
HTTPServerWorker Implements the Worker interface for the HttpServer and used by the server when spawning worker threads for incoming data.
MetaFaceDefaultServer Implementation of a basic HTTP server for Firewall tunneling.
MetaFaceDynamicService This class provides a dynamic client service based on rendering of VHML files as they are needed for a response to a client's stimulus.
MetaFaceHTTPServer Implementation of a basic HTTP server for Firewall tunneling.
MetaFaceService This class provides the basis for client services.
MetaFaceStaticService This class provides a static client service based on the prerendering of VHML.
Pool Implements Thread Pooling.
VHMLParser This class is used to construct an eXtensible Markup Language (XML) parser for a Virtual Human Markup Language (VHML)document.
